msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; the first line (or the first word) of the ʿarke-hymns after commemorative notes; five groups of red lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of the months Mäggabit, Miyazya; four groups of red lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of the months Gǝnbot, Säne, Ḥamle; three groups of red lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of the month Näḥase; the name of the original donor in the supplication formulas (blotted out); two initial lines of the beginning of commemorative notices for each day; one initial line of each commemorative notice; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numbers; ዘአቅረብኩ and ዘጸሐፎ in the concluding prayers.

msItem.note: The subsections for some months starts on verso-side: Gǝnbot on fol. 45va; Ḥamle on fol. 98v; Näḥase on fol. 135v.

Written in Amharic; robably the same as in Additio 3 of Ms. BGY-001 (fols. 137vс-138ra)

- Internal number of the ecclesiastic library has been crudely written on fol. 1r: ስን No 3-1 24-8-93. - Tämälläs-signs in the shape of two perpendicular lines with loops at the ends of each line, indicating the place where the passages rewritten in the upper margins belong: fols. 4r, 4v, 5r, 5v, 6v. - A sign in the shape of cross (possibly tämälläs-sign, but no omitted text passages are indicated in the margin): e.g., fols. 5vc (between columns b and c, and above column c), 66r (betwen columns b and c), 67r (inner margin), 97v (between columns a and b), 98v, 99r, 99v etc. - Scribbles: fols. 16r, 18r, 119v, upper margin; fols. 142va, bottom margin. - Lacunae: fol. 45rc. - Space for rubricated names is left unfilled in the supplication formulas starting from fol. 101. - Omitted words and passages written interlineally, in the main hand: fol. 70ra, 128rb. - Corrections written over erasures, in a secondary hand: fols. 72rb, 79vb, 79vc, 85rc, 88ra etc. - Erasures marked with triple thin black lines: fols. 78va, 102rb - The damaged passages are rewritten in a secondary hand, in the upper margin (fols. 2v, 3r, 3v, 4r, 4v, 5r, 5v, 6r, 6v, 7r, 8v, 9r, 9v, 10r, 11r, 13r, 14v, 15r, 16v). - Lost passages are rewritten in a secondary hand: fols. 71v, 162ra.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with dark-brown tooled leather. Overback made of light-colored untooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.
The manuscript was probably resewn (leather cover is removed so that the holes for threads are left open)
Blind tooled ornament on the leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: double circle, double crescent, double sine wave with dots, waffles, criss-cross, hatching).

person.persName: The name of the original donor has been erased from the supplications formulas. On some fols. (2ra, 25rc, 45rc, 79vb, etc.) the name of Zärʾa Ḥawaryat appears, written in a secondary hand, in black ink, over the erased name. On some fols., this name itself has been blotted out (fol. 19ra, 68rb, 70vc). The same name also appears on fol. 71v.
